languages.text: Вольный Торговец Теодора фон Валанциус изъявила желание лично встретиться с человеком, недавно доставленным на борт ее пустотного флагмана. На горизонте династии сгущаются тучи, и Лорд-капитану есть о чем поведать свое{mf|му|й} наследни{mf|ку|це} — если такая возможность предоставится.

traits.locale_text: Вольный Торговец Теодора фон Валанциус изъявила желание лично встретиться с человеком, надавно доставленным на борт ее пустотного флагмана. На горизонте династии сгущаются тучи, и Лорд-капитану есть о чем поведать свое{mf|му|й} наследни{mf|ку|це} — если такая возможность предоставится.

languages.text: Rogue Trader Theodora von Valancius desires to personally meet with the person recently brought aboard her flagship. A storm is brewing over the dynasty, so the Lord Captain has something important to share with her heir — if she ever gets the chance.
languages.original_text: Вольный Торговец Теодора фон Валанциус изъявила желание лично встретиться с человеком, недавно доставленным на борт ее пустотного флагмана. На горизонте династии сгущаются тучи, и Лорд-капитану есть о чем поведать свое{mf|му|й} наследни{mf|ку|це} — если такая возможность предоставится.

traits.locale_text: Rogue Trader Theodora von Valancius desires to personally meet with the person recently brought aboard her flagship. The storm is brewing over the dynasty, so the Lord Captain has something important to share with her heir — if she'll ever get that chance.

Rogue Trader Theodora von Valancius desires to personally meet with the person recently brought aboard her flagship. A storm is brewing over the dynasty, so the Lord Captain has something important to share with her heir — if she ever gets the chance.

Rogue Trader Theodora von Valancius desires to personally meet with the person recently brought aboard her flagship. A storm is brewing over the dynasty, so the Lord Captain has something important to share with her heir — if she ever gets the chance.

languages.text: Freihändlerin Theodora von Valancius will die Person persönlich treffen, die kürzlich an Bord ihres Flaggschiffs gebracht wurde. Ein Sturm zieht sich über der Dynastie zusammen, und darum möchte der Lord Captain etwas Wichtiges mit {mf|ihrem Erben|ihrer Erbin} besprechen – falls sie jemals Gelegenheit dazu erhält.
languages.original_text: Rogue Trader Theodora von Valancius desires to personally meet with the person recently brought aboard her flagship. A storm is brewing over the dynasty, so the Lord Captain has something important to share with her heir — if she ever gets the chance.

traits.locale_text: Freihändlerin Theodora von Valancius will die Person persönlich treffen, die kürzlich an Bord ihres Flaggschiffs gebracht wurde. Ein Sturm zieht sich über der Dynastie zusammen, und darum möchte der Lord Captain etwas Wichtiges mit {mf|ihrem Erben|ihrer Erbin} besprechen – falls sie jemals Gelegenheit dazu erhält.

languages.text: La libre-marchande Théodora von Valancius souhaite rencontrer personnellement la personne qui vient d'arriver à bord de son vaisseau. Une tempête menace la dynastie, aussi la seigneure-capitaine a-t-elle quelque chose d'important à communiquer à son héritier... à supposer qu'elle en ait l'occasion.
languages.original_text: Rogue Trader Theodora von Valancius desires to personally meet with the person recently brought aboard her flagship. A storm is brewing over the dynasty, so the Lord Captain has something important to share with her heir — if she ever gets the chance.

traits.locale_text: La libre-marchande Théodora von Valancius souhaite rencontrer personnellement la personne qui vient d'arriver à bord de son vaisseau. Une tempête menace la dynastie, aussi la seigneure-capitaine a-t-elle quelque chose d'important à communiquer à son héritier... à supposer qu'elle en ait l'occasion.

languages.text: 行商浪人西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯打算亲自接见被带到她旗舰上的继承人。冯·瓦兰修斯王朝此刻正在面临一场风暴，领主舰长希望能亲自接见她的继承人，告知他们某些重要的事情。
languages.original_text: Rogue Trader Theodora von Valancius desires to personally meet with the person recently brought aboard her flagship. A storm is brewing over the dynasty, so the Lord Captain has something important to share with her heir — if she ever gets the chance.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯打算亲自接见被带到她旗舰上的继承人。冯·瓦兰修斯王朝此刻正在面临一场风暴，领主舰长希望能亲自接见她的继承人，告知他们某些重要的事情。

languages.text: 自由開拓者シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスは、先日自分の旗艦に連れてこられた人物と個人的に会いたいと思っている。王朝をめぐって嵐が吹き荒れているため、ロード・キャプテンには跡継ぎと分かち合いたい重要なことがあるのだ…もしその機会があるのならば。
languages.original_text: Rogue Trader Theodora von Valancius desires to personally meet with the person recently brought aboard her flagship. A storm is brewing over the dynasty, so the Lord Captain has something important to share with her heir — if she ever gets the chance.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスは、先日自分の旗艦に連れてこられた人物と個人的に会いたいと思っている。王朝をめぐって嵐が吹き荒れているため、ロード・キャプテンには跡継ぎと分かち合いたい重要なことがあるのだ…もしその機会があるのならば。

languages.text: La Comerciante Independiente Theodora von Valancius quiere reunirse personalmente con la persona que ha subido recientemente a su nave. Una tormenta se cierne sobre la dinastía, por lo que la Lord Capitán tiene algo que contarle a su hereder{mf|o|a}... si es que puede.
languages.original_text: Rogue Trader Theodora von Valancius desires to personally meet with the person recently brought aboard her flagship. A storm is brewing over the dynasty, so the Lord Captain has something important to share with her heir — if she ever gets the chance.

traits.locale_text: La Comerciante Independiente Theodora von Valancius quiere reunirse personalmente con la persona que ha subido recientemente a su nave. Una tormenta se cierne sobre la dinastía, por lo que la Lord Capitán tiene algo que contarle a su hereder{mf|o|a}... si es que puede.

languages.text: Hür Tacir Theodora von Valancius, yakın zamanda sancak gemisine getirilen kişiyle bizzat görüşmek istiyor. Hanedanlık üstünde fırtına bulutları toplanıyor, bu yüzden de Lord Kaptan'ın vârisiyle paylaşması gereken önemli bir mevzu var... Tabii fırsat bulabilirse.
languages.original_text: Rogue Trader Theodora von Valancius desires to personally meet with the person recently brought aboard her flagship. A storm is brewing over the dynasty, so the Lord Captain has something important to share with her heir — if she ever gets the chance.

traits.locale_text: Hür Tacir Theodora von Valancius, yakın zamanda sancak gemisine getirilen kişiyle bizzat görüşmek istiyor. Hanedanlık üstünde fırtına bulutları toplanıyor, bu yüzden de Lord Kaptan'ın vârisiyle paylaşması gereken önemli bir mevzu var... Tabii fırsat bulabilirse.
